channel.title: Comments on: Corona Geek #31 – App Video Promotion With Apptamin

item.title: By: Patrick Garde
item.dc:creator: Patrick Garde
item.description:
Nice video. Thank you for the tips.
At first, I didn't know how to use video to effectively promote an app, but with this post, I learned how to increase app exposure (and hopefully - sales).
I'll definitely bookmark this post and probably watch the video again.
item.content:encoded:
Nice video. Thank you for the tips.

At first, I didn’t know how to use video to effectively promote an app, but with this post, I learned how to increase app exposure (and hopefully – sales).

I’ll definitely bookmark this post and probably watch the video again.

item.title: By: Charles McKeever
item.dc:creator: Charles McKeever
item.description:
Thank you Alex. It was great to talk with you at SXSW and to see all the people at the Mindgrub Games booth. Thank you for the great t-shirt. Next time I wear it on the show, I'll try to get more of the design in the video :)
Let me know when we can get you guys on a hangout. We'd love to hear your developer story.
item.content:encoded:
Thank you Alex. It was great to talk with you at SXSW and to see all the people at the Mindgrub Games booth. Thank you for the great t-shirt. Next time I wear it on the show, I’ll try to get more of the design in the video ðŸ™‚

Let me know when we can get you guys on a hangout. We’d love to hear your developer story.

item.title: By: Alex Hachey
item.dc:creator: Alex Hachey
item.description: Hey Charles! Great shirt- love the Mindgrub Games swag!! Love this episode- this is great stuff, I'll have to become a regular viewer for sure! It was great meeting you at the Games Expo in Austin!
item.content:encoded: Hey Charles! Great shirt- love the Mindgrub Games swag!! Love this episode- this is great stuff, I’ll have to become a regular viewer for sure! It was great meeting you at the Games Expo in Austin!
